about_the_game:
Be honest: round after round, always in circles on a well-maintained asphalt road, isn't that boring after a while? Stop it! Because now there is Off-Road! Race at full throttle over dusty slopes, ski jumps and through mud puddles. Experience what it's like to take turns with powerslides.

Enjoy a unique driving experience that you have probably never experienced before. And remember: you can't take potholes into account!

Off-Road allows the player to race high performance buggies and sand rails across six stunning locations. Slide, jump, skid and wheel spin around circuits specifically designed to offer maximum thrills and spills.
Off-Road gives the player a wild and bumpy yet exhilarating ride across all manner of terrains.

Features

  • LAN multi-player mode competition.
  • Up to 8 human opponents.
  • 24 challenging tracks in 6 different locations.
